mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_jw_gap_rule ( seg1_2, seg2_3, seg3_4, seg4_5, seg5_6, seg6_7, seg7_8, task_id, class_id, course_id ) VALUES ( #{seg12}, #{seg23}, #{seg34}, #{seg45}, #{seg56}, #{seg67}, #{seg78}, #{taskId}, #{classId}, #{courseId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:

seg1_2 = #{seg12},

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_gap_rule
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND seg1_2 like CONCAT('%', #{seg12} , '%')
AND seg2_3 like CONCAT('%', #{seg23} , '%')
AND seg3_4 like CONCAT('%', #{seg34} , '%')
AND seg4_5 like CONCAT('%', #{seg45} , '%')
AND seg5_6 like CONCAT('%', #{seg56} , '%')
AND seg6_7 like CONCAT('%', #{seg67} , '%')
AND seg7_8 like CONCAT('%', #{seg78} , '%')
AND task_id like CONCAT('%', #{taskId} , '%')
AND class_id like CONCAT('%', #{classId} , '%')
AND course_id like CONCAT('%', #{courseId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
